subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit & Reflection -  now Clean ClassLoader Environment for Tests.
msgSnippet: From: Oisin Kim  Sent: Friday, February 06, 2004 10:18 AM ... I submitted a reloading classloader to the group files section if you re
messageBody:
From: "Oisin Kim" <oisin.kim@...>
Sent: Friday, February 06, 2004 10:18 AM
> I've fixed the problem here which was due to a Custom ClassLoader
> which was written and didn't behave as it was expected to, I've
> inherited this code, its used to proved a clean classloader
> environment to tests, so that test methods have clean static instances
> for every test run.
>

I submitted a reloading classloader to the group files section if you're
interested.

- Neil Swingler
